Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st/Washtenaw, due to street blockage near 71st/Washtenaw  Eastbound buses will operate via :71st, California, 69th and Wester 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 71st/Washtenaw
ShortDescription: 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted EB:71st, California, 69th and Western; WB 67th, Western, 69th, California and 71st: due to, st blockage near 71st/Washtenaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st/Washtenaw, due to street blockage near 71st/Washtenaw

Eastbound buses will operate via :71st, California, 69th and Western including the normal route streets.

Westbound  buses will operate via 67th, Western, 69th, California and 71st.

Allow extra travel time.
